name: Old Bridge of Ourense
address: Ponte Vella, Rúa Progreso, 32001 Ourense, Galicia, Spain
info: Historic Roman bridge crossing the Miño River in Ourense.

name: Ruins of Santo Domingo, Pontevedra
address: Paseo de Montero Ríos s/n, 36001 Pontevedra, Galicia, Spain
info: Remains of a 14th-century Gothic convent in Pontevedra.

name: Hórreo of Carnota
address: Praza San Mamede, 15293 Carnota, A Coruña, Galicia, Spain
info: One of the longest traditional granaries in Galicia.

name: Combarro, Pontevedra
address: Rúa do Mar, 36993 Combarro, Pontevedra, Galicia, Spain
info: Charming coastal village known for hórreos and granite houses.

name: Wall of Lugo
info: Roman wall surrounding the old town of Lugo, UNESCO site.

name: Cathedral of Santiago de Compostela
address: Praza do Obradoiro, s/n, 15704 Santiago de Compostela, Galicia, Spain
info: Pilgrimage destination and final stop of the Camino de Santiago.

name: Combarro Village
address: Rúa do Mar, 36993 Combarro, Pontevedra, Galicia, Spain
info: Historic fishing village with Galician architecture.

name: Mount Santa Trega
address: Monte de Santa Trega, 36788 A Guarda, Pontevedra, Galicia, Spain
info: Scenic mountain with Celtic ruins and views over the Atlantic.
